opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Kahvedzic v. Republic of Croatia, Ante, P. 966

opinion:
537 U.S. 1150

KAHVEDZIC
v.
REPUBLIC OF CROATIA ET AL., ante, p. 966.

No. 02-5917.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 13, 2003.

1

Motion of petitioner to defer consideration of petition for rehearing denied. Petition for rehearing denied. JUSTICE SCALIA took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
